product_name: Lorpen Trekking Modal/CoolMax FX Socks - Men's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: The Modal / CoolMax FX socks are perfect for warm weather hiking. The inner layer of modal fibers is soft and comfortable while the middle layer of CoolMax FX is fast-drying and antibacterial.
short_description: The Modal / CoolMax FX socks are perfect for warm weather hiking. The inner layer of modal fibers is soft and comfortable while the middle layer of CoolMax FX is fast-drying and antibacterial.
